name: Neuro Dungeon (James Bryan, Shane Carroll)
description:
Mobile game developed last semester.
Brief: A game that can teach medical students about the cranial nerves.
Concept: Dungeon Crawler in which the player discovers different passages(nerves) answering different questions to get further into the level. The level layout designed after the nerves to get an accurate representation of the nerve paths.
At the end of each passage is a in game clue that represents where the player is in the head.
